Name: Awesome Puzzle
About the game: Awesome Puzzle is an educational game for children in which you have to collect a picture from puzzles. The game has 12 levels, a pleasant atmosphere for children. Good music, nice graphics, mouse control, the game develops memory well. The game features: - Good graphics - Beautiful animal drawings - Multiple worlds - 12 levels - Nice musical accompaniment
